---
title: "readings"
output: html_document
---

```{r,include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr))
```


```{r, results='asis'}
dir <- "readings/"
list.files(dir) %>%
  sort %>% 
  grep("\\.html$", ., value=TRUE, invert=TRUE) %>% 
  paste0("- [", ., "](", paste0(dir, .), ")") %>% 
  cat(sep="\n") 
```
